title: Competency Enhancement Program for Practical Social Studies Skills Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational social science theory or practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning process for in-service professionals to integrate theory and practice in social sector projects

learning_goals: Learners can complete project-based assignments by adjusting face-to-face/online activities in a 70:30 ratio within blended learning environments
Learners can share resources in real-time and exchange feedback with team members using online collaboration tools (e.g., Google Workspace)
Learners can enhance learning efficiency by 20% or more by designing and implementing social problem-solving projects that leverage blended learning advantages
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
